name: Natural Language Processing Projects
description: I have many web dev projects, but these are the main projects I had made.

data.name: SMS Spam Classifier
data.description: SMS Spam Classifier using Natural Language Processing, with help of machine learning. Here we can predict a message Spam or not. It helps us to protect from potential scams.

data.name: Predict Stock Price Movement Based On News Headline
data.description: Here we can predict a company's stock price goes up or down based on this day's news headline. With this, we can plan our stock market investments.
